name: landing-page-audit
description: Inspired by u/abhishvekc's viral Reddit post "Landing page design that will get your paying users" (r/SideProject, 836 upvotes, 88 comments — reddit.com/r/SideProject/comments/1kicwb0). Posted the same framework twice for 1,600+ total upvotes. Audits your landing page against a proven 7-section conversion framework: hero (heading + CTA + demo), trust logos, top features, differentiation, testimonials, FAQ, and closing CTA. Each section gets a PASS, PARTIAL, or MISSING verdict with specific fixes.
